articles.author: Agence France-Presse
articles.title: China warns against 'expansion' of Ukraine war - VOA Asia
articles.description: 'China is committed to playing a constructive role,' the nation's foreign minister says
articles.content:
United Nations  China 's Foreign Minister Wang Yi warned Saturday against the expansion of the war in Ukraine, which has accused Beijing of assisting Russia in its war.
